articles.author: Angela Giuffrida
articles.title: US-born ‘princess’ evicted from Rome villa housing Caravaggio fresco - The Guardian
articles.description: Rita Boncompagni Ludovisi escorted from 16th-century home amid long-running inheritance dispute
articles.content: A princess who was evicted from a villa in Rome that contains the only ceiling fresco ever painted by Caravaggio said she was sorry to experience such a brutal end to what has been a labour of love.… [+3953 chars]
